summary: The BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces extensive backend and frontend functionality (shop/UPI/payments, profiles/auth, routing/UI changes, and performance/caching optimizations) that is not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend additions/changes introducing UPI/website configuration state, shop/cart/purchase domain types, and user profile/profile access functions with authorization checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so adding new backend business logic and APIs is unrequested scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend routing refactor with lazy-loaded pages, Suspense loading fallbacks, dynamic document title updates, and React Query client configuration changes (aggressive caching, disabled refetch behaviors).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so these application-level behavior changes are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Header/navigation behavior changes including authentication UI logic, redirect-after-login behavior, toast notifications on auth errors, and cart item count integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so adding/altering auth UX and cart-aware navigation is unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded React Query hooks for admin checks, shop CRUD, cart operations, UPI config retrieval/update, website config retrieval, purchase flows, etc.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so adding these data-fetching/mutation hooks is unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Global CSS/theme/performance styling changes (color variables, base styles, content-visibility for images, reduced motion handling, GPU acceleration utilities).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so broad styling/performance CSS changes are unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Home page UI updates including dynamic website-config-driven server status/tagline and memoization/lazy image loading behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so homepage feature/UX changes are unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Shop page UI updates including category filtering, memoization for item filtering/cart total, checkout modal integration, UPI config usage, and add-to-cart/purchase flows.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so shop and checkout functionality changes are unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduction/mention of multiple additional frontend components/pages and configuration changes (e.g., ProfileSetupModal, UPIQRCodeModal, AdminDashboardPage, tailwind config adjustments, layout/natural scroll changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so these added/changed UI features are unrequested scope. Evidence is limited to the diff summary file list/descriptions.
